#Loading Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(DT)


```


```{r}
stickle <- read_csv('stickleback_fossil_vs_extant.csv')
summary(stickle)
#seems every column outside of ID has missing data to some extent
#Highest amount of NA's is cle.sc column
#least amount of NAs in mds column
```


```{r}
datatable(stickle)
```

```{r}

stickle$univID
```
